mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, sd.value as status_value, sd.remark as status_color, p.title as payment_name, u.nickname as user_name FROM t_user_deposit a LEFT JOIN t_user_info u ON (a.user_id=u.userId) LEFT JOIN shop_payment p ON (a.payment_id=p.id) left join `sys_dict` sd on(a.status=sd.code and sd.type='user_deposit_status') WHERE 1 = 1 and a.is_del=0
and ( u.nickname like '%${params.key}%' or a.user_id=#{params.key} )
and a.status = #{params.status}
order by a.create_time desc
